    <script type="text/javascript">"use strict";(function(){var config={sample:{jsnotfound:.02,imgError:.02},logServer:"https://sp1.baidu.com/5b1ZeDe5KgQFm2e88IuM_a/mwb2.gif"};var imgErrorLen=0;function shouldSend(sample){if(!sample){return false}var hitCookie=document.cookie.indexOf("webbtest=1")>-1;return hitCookie||Math.random()<sample}function send(obj){var type=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:"except";if(!shouldSend(config.sample[obj.group])){return""}var pid="1_87";if(bds.comm.ishome){pid="1_79"}
var lid=bds.comm.qid||bds.comm.queryId;var logUrl=config.logServer+"?pid="+pid+"&lid="+lid+"&ts="+Date.now()+"&type="+type+"&group="+obj.group+"&info="+encodeURIComponent(JSON.stringify(obj.info))+"&dim="+encodeURIComponent(JSON.stringify(obj.dim||{}));var img=new Image;img.src=logUrl;return logUrl}function getPathTo(element){var _element$parentNode;if(element.id!==""){return'id("'.concat(element.id,'")')}if(element===document.body){return element.tagName}var ix=0;var siblings=(
element===null||element===void 0?void 0:(_element$parentNode=element.parentNode)===null||_element$parentNode===void 0?void 0:_element$parentNode.childNodes)?element.parentNode.childNodes:[];for(var i=0;i<siblings.length;i++){var sibling=siblings[i];if(sibling===element){return getPathTo(sibling.parentNode)+"/"+element.tagName+"["+(ix+1)+"]"}if(sibling.nodeType===1&&sibling.tagName===element.tagName){ix++}}return""}function getLocation(href){var ele=document.createElement("a");ele.href=href
;return ele}function getUrlHost(url){var host=getLocation(url).hostname;if(!/\.baidu|bcebos|bdstatic|baidubce|bdimg\.com/.test(host)){return"other"}return host}function imgError(target,info){var imgSrc=target.getAttribute("src")||"";var time=(new Date).getTime();info.msg=imgSrc;info.errLen=++imgErrorLen;info.xpath=getPathTo(target);send({info:info,dim:{host:getUrlHost(imgSrc)},group:"imgError"},"et_comm");window.imgErrList.push({info:info,time:time})}function sourceError(event){try{var obj={
info:{},dim:{},group:""};var info=obj.info;var target=event.target;var dataConnection=navigator.connection||{};info.downlink=dataConnection.downlink;info.effectiveType=dataConnection.effectiveType;info.rtt=dataConnection.rtt;info.deviceMemory=navigator.deviceMemory||0;info.hardwareConcurrency=navigator.hardwareConcurrency||0;info.saveData=!!dataConnection.saveData;if(target&&target.nodeName&&target.nodeName.toLowerCase()==="img"){imgError(target,info);return}var localName=target.localName||""
;var errorLink=target.src||"";if(localName&&localName==="script"){obj.group="jsnotfound";info.msg=errorLink;info.file=errorLink;send(obj)}}catch(e){}}window.imgErrList=[];window.addEventListener&&window.addEventListener("error",sourceError,true)})();</script>

}else if(mType=="[object Array]"){for(var i=0,len=modName.length;i<len;i++){if(modName[i].indexOf(":")<0){modName[i]=this.svnMod+":"+modName[i]}}}evt.on(modName,evtName,handler)});F._setContextMethod("unListen",function(modName,evtName,handler){evt.un(this.svnMod+":"+this.modName,evtName,handler)})});F._loadScriptTimeout=15e3;F._useConfig=true;F._firstScreenCSS=F._firstScreenCSS||[];F._firstScreenCSS.push("/css/super_min-2ab4288be5.css");F._firstScreenJS=F._firstScreenJS||[]

<script>
$(window).on("load", function() {
    var e = $('#virus-2020');
    e.click(function() {
        $.setCookie('virus-2020-clicked', '1');
        e.removeClass('dot');
    });
    var hasClicked = $.getCookie && $.getCookie('virus-2020-clicked');
    if (!hasClicked) {
        e.addClass('dot');
    }
});
</script>

if (window.JSTracker2 && typeof window.JSTracker2.setJsErrorFilters === 'function') {
  window.JSTracker2.setJsErrorFilters([
      (info) => {
          if ((info.message && /jsonp[0-9]* is not defined/.test(info.message)) || (info.message && /Uncaught Error: decodeURIComponent error :/.test(info.message)) || (info.message && /Uncaught NotSupportedError:/.test(info.message)) || (info.message && /Uncaught NoSuchMethodException:/.test(info.message)) || (info.message && /SecurityError/.test(info.message)) || (info.message && /Permission denied/.test(info.message))) {
              return true; 
          }
      },
      (info) => {
          if (info.message && (/Cannot read property/.test(info.message) || /null is not an object/.test(info.message) || /Microsoft Internet/.test(info.message) || /该操作尝试访问的数据/.test(info.message) || /无法重新定义不可配置的属性/.test(info.message) || /Unexpected/.test(info.message) || /拒绝访问/.test(info.message) || /未指明的错误/.test(info.message) || /参数无效/.test(info.message) || /URI malformed/.test(info.message) || /这个系统不支持该功能/.test(info.message) || /无法获取未定义/.test(info.message) || /磁盘空间不足/.test(info.message) || /Cannot read properties/.test(info.message))) {
              return true;
          }
      },       
      (info) => {
          if (info.message && info.message.indexOf("$ is not defined") > -1) {
              return true;
          }
      },           
      (info) => {
          if (info.message && info.message.indexOf("Cannot redefine property: platform") > -1) {
              return true;
          }
      },
      (info) => {
          if (info.message && info.message.indexOf("onLayoutChanged is not defined") > -1) {
              return true;
          }
      }                
  ]);
}

<script type="text/javascript">
    function getQueryString(name) {   
      var reg = new RegExp("(^|&)" + name + "=([^&]*)(&|$)"); //构造一个含有目标参数的正则表达式对象  
      var r = window.location.search.substr(1).match(reg);  //匹配目标参数
      if( r != null ) return decodeURIComponent( r[2] ); return '';   
    }
    function stripscript(s){ 
      var pattern = new RegExp("[`~!@#$^&*()=|{}':;',\\[\\].<>/?~！@#￥……&*（）——|{}【】‘；：”“'。，、？%]") 
      var rs = ""; 
      for (var i = 0; i < s.length; i++) { 
        rs = rs+s.substr(i, 1).replace(pattern, ''); 
      } 
      return rs; 
    }
    var blogHotWords = stripscript(getQueryString('utm_term')).length > 1 ? stripscript(getQueryString('utm_term')) : ''
</script>

    <article class="baidu_pl">
        <div id="article_content" class="article_content clearfix">
        <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://csdnimg.cn/release/blogv2/dist/mdeditor/css/editerView/ck_htmledit_views-1a85854398.css">
                <div id="content_views" class="markdown_views prism-tomorrow-night">
                    <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" style="display: none;">
                        <path stroke-linecap="round" d="M5,0 0,2.5 5,5z" id="raphael-marker-block" style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);"></path>
                    </svg>
                    <p><img src="https://img-blog.csdnimg.cn/20201224232749594.png?x-oss-process&#61;image/watermark,type_ZmFuZ3poZW5naGVpdGk,shadow_10,text_aHR0cHM6Ly9ibG9nLmNzZG4ubmV0L2tlZXBhd2FyZQ&#61;&#61;,size_16,color_FFFFFF,t_70#pic_center" alt="在这里插入图片描述" width="100" /></p> 
<p><font color="#999AAA">之前已经介绍过类的一些基础知识&#xff0c;同时装饰器也在前面的博客中记录过了&#xff0c;大家有兴趣的话可以去翻一下呀。<a href="https://blog.csdn.net/keepaware/article/details/109392144">在这里哦</a>&#xff01;装饰器的功能就是可以让函数多一些功能&#xff0c;注意这里是装饰函数哦&#xff0c;所以这些额外的功能往往是可以重复被各种函数使用的&#xff0c;也正是因此使用装饰器的话就能避免代码的重写&#xff0c;也使得代码变得更加有条理更加简洁。装饰器的功能不再赘述啦。</font></p> 
<p><font color="#999AAA">在python的类中&#xff0c;由于类中包含有函数&#xff0c;因此类中也有经常需要使用到的装饰器&#xff0c;这些装饰器的功能可是很强大的哦&#xff0c;它们分别是classmethod(类方法&#xff0c;仅仅是个翻译哈。这里要注意不要和类中的函数混淆哦&#xff0c;因为类中的函数我们也叫类方法)、staticmethod(静态方法)、property(类属性装饰器)。这些装饰器都是默认存在于python中的&#xff0c;因此使用时不用再安装什么其它的东西啦&#xff0c;直接使用就行。</font></p> 
<p>附上类使用专栏的其它文章的链接&#xff1a;</p> 
<ul><li><a href="https://blog.csdn.net/keepaware/article/details/110452019">python 类的使用(1) 之类使用的基本框架</a></li><li><a href="https://blog.csdn.net/keepaware/article/details/110882081">python 类的使用(2) 之类变量</a></li><li><a href="https://blog.csdn.net/keepaware/article/details/111655393">python 类的使用(3)之类中常用的三个装饰器&#64;classmethod、&#64;staticmethod、&#64;property</a></li><li><a href="https://blog.csdn.net/keepaware/article/details/112909673">python 类的使用(4)之类常用的魔法方法</a></li><li><a href="https://blog.csdn.net/keepaware/article/details/112909406">python 类的使用(5)之类装饰器(类的装饰器和类作为装饰器)</a></li><li><a href="https://blog.csdn.net/keepaware/article/details/113954235">python 类的使用(6)之类的继承</a></li><li><a href="https://blog.csdn.net/keepaware/article/details/115068949">python 类的使用(7)之类的私有属性和方法 (类中以单下划线或双下划线开头的变量名或函数名)</a></li></ul> 
<p></p>
<div class="toc">
 <h3>文章目录</h3>
 <ul><li><a href="#font_color339966classmethod_25"><font color="#339966">classmethod</font></a></li><li><ul><li><a href="#font_color339966_30"><font color="#339966">修改类变量的例子&#xff1a;</font></a></li><li><a href="#font_color339966_60"><font color="#339966">产生类实例的方法&#xff1a;</font></a></li></ul>
  </li><li><a href="#font_color339966staticmethod_98"><font color="#339966">staticmethod</font></a></li><li><a href="#font_color339966property_133"><font color="#339966">property</font></a></li><li><a href="#font_color339966_194"><font color="#339966">叮</font></a></li></ul>
</div>
<p></p> 
<hr color="#0000FF" size="1&#34;" /> 
<h1><a id="font_color339966classmethod_25"></a><font color="#339966">classmethod</font></h1> 
<p>classmethod能够完成的功能有&#xff1a;</p> 
<ul><li><font color="#0099FF">修改类中的变量&#xff0c;不论是类变量还是类实例传入的参数变量</font></li><li><font color="#0099FF">产生类实例&#xff0c;即装饰有classmethod的函数能够产生类实例</font>(可能会有点懵&#xff0c;看看例子就明白啦)</li></ul> 
<h2><a id="font_color339966_30"></a><font color="#339966">修改类变量的例子&#xff1a;</font></h2> 
<pre><code class="prism language-javascript"><span class="token keyword">class</span> <span class="token class-name">Worker</span><span class="token punctuation">:</span>

    raise_percent <span class="token operator">&#61;</span> <span class="token number">1</span>       # 默认没有涨工资&#xff0c;比例为<span class="token number">1</span>

    def <span class="token function">__init__</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>self<span class="token punctuation">,</span> name<span class="token punctuation">,</span> salary<span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">:</span>
        self<span class="token punctuation">.</span>name <span class="token operator">&#61;</span> name
        self<span class="token punctuation">.</span>salary <span class="token operator">&#61;</span> salary
        
    &#64;classmethod            # 加入此装饰器
    def <span class="token function">ch_raise_percent</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>cls<span class="token punctuation">,</span> num<span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">:</span>        # 修改涨薪比例的函数
        cls<span class="token punctuation">.</span>raise_percent <span class="token operator">&#61;</span> num <span class="token operator">*</span> cls<span class="token punctuation">.</span>raise_percent   # 传入一个数乘以之前的涨薪比例
    <span class="token string">&#39;&#39;</span>&#39;
    <span class="token function">这里要多解释一下&#xff0c;传入的是cls&#xff0c;这里cls代表类本身。要传入类本身才能够修改类本身的内容</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>如类变量<span class="token punctuation">)</span>&#xff0c;
    由于传的是类本身&#xff0c;使用<span class="token keyword">class</span>的话会与<span class="token keyword">class</span>定义语句有冲突&#xff0c;因此使用classmethod要传入类的信息时&#xff0c;
    将类本身以cls形式传入。
    <span class="token function">后面传入的num是在调用这个函数</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>即ch_raise_percent<span class="token punctuation">)</span>时传入的参数&#xff0c;这个参数和创建类实例需要的
    参数是没有关系的&#xff0c;因为调用这个函数仅仅是修改了类本身的信息。
    <span class="token string">&#39;&#39;</span>&#39;
        
Worker<span class="token punctuation">.</span><span class="token function">ch_raise_percent</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token number">1.3</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span>   
# 这里在类外部调用classmethod装饰的函数&#xff0c;并传入一个num参数用于修改涨薪比例
<span class="token function">print</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>Worker<span class="token punctuation">.</span>raise_percent<span class="token punctuation">)</span>
# 使用类本身查看其类变量是否变化

# 执行结果为<span class="token number">1.3</span>&#xff0c;表示这里我们确实把Worker类的raise_percent类变量给修改了。
</code></pre> 
<p>有人可能会想使用其它方式不能直接修改类变量吗&#xff0c;比如在类函数中传入self&#xff0c;然后调用类变量(即self.raise_percent)来进行修改&#xff0c;但是实际上你<font color="#0099FF">在类函数中调用后修改产生的是局部变量&#xff0c;整个类是获取不到你修改得到的局部变量的</font>。当然还有可能你会想使用global或者nonlocal(如global self.raise_percent或者self.raise_percent)等方法使函数产生的结果变成非局部变量&#xff0c;这个我也试了&#xff0c;好像是不行的。如果你还有其它方法的话&#xff0c;也欢迎提出来呀&#xff01;</p> 
<h2><a id="font_color339966_60"></a><font color="#339966">产生类实例的方法&#xff1a;</font></h2> 
<p>产生类实例的方法真的是非常好用啊&#xff0c;比如你的初始数据是一堆有规则的字符串&#xff0c;而这些字符串中包含着每个类实例所需的参数&#xff0c;那么你只需要添加一个classmethod装饰的函数&#xff0c;用这个函数帮你处理一下你的字符串&#xff0c;将这些字符串分成独立的项&#xff0c;再将这些项传递给类就可以产生类实例啦&#xff01;</p> 
<p><font color="#339966">看看例子哈&#xff1a;</font></p> 
<pre><code class="prism language-javascript"><span class="token keyword">class</span> <span class="token class-name">Worker</span><span class="token punctuation">:</span>

    def <span class="token function">__init__</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>self<span class="token punctuation">,</span> name<span class="token punctuation">,</span> age<span class="token punctuation">,</span> height<span class="token punctuation">,</span> salary<span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">:</span>
        self<span class="token punctuation">.</span>name <span class="token operator">&#61;</span> name
        self<span class="token punctuation">.</span>age <span class="token operator">&#61;</span> age
        self<span class="token punctuation">.</span>height <span class="token operator">&#61;</span> height
        self<span class="token punctuation">.</span>salary <span class="token operator">&#61;</span> salary
    
    &#64;classmethod
    def <span class="token function">str_handler</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>cls<span class="token punctuation">,</span> string<span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">:</span>
        name<span class="token punctuation">,</span> age<span class="token punctuation">,</span> height<span class="token punctuation">,</span> salary <span class="token operator">&#61;</span> string<span class="token punctuation">.</span><span class="token function">split</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token string">&#39;/&#39;</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span>  
        # 将传入的字符串以<span class="token operator">/</span>分割产生列表&#xff0c;一一对应
        <span class="token keyword">return</span> <span class="token function">cls</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>name<span class="token punctuation">,</span> age<span class="token punctuation">,</span> height<span class="token punctuation">,</span> salary<span class="token punctuation">)</span>
        # 这里<span class="token keyword">return</span>返回的就是cls&#xff0c;也就是一个类实例&#xff0c;将Worker类类实例需要的
        # 所有项都传入了cls&#xff0c;这就是一个完完整整的类实例啦
        # 要注意<span class="token keyword">return</span>返回值可以被变量接收&#xff0c;接收后就成为类实例咯
    
<span class="token constant">A</span> <span class="token operator">&#61;</span> <span class="token string">&#39;Jack/20/1.75/1000&#39;</span>   
<span class="token constant">B</span> <span class="token operator">&#61;</span> <span class="token string">&#39;Mary/18/1.65/2000&#39;</span>
# 两个需要处理的字符串

a <span class="token operator">&#61;</span> Worker<span class="token punctuation">.</span><span class="token function">str_handler</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token constant">A</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span>
b <span class="token operator">&#61;</span> Worker<span class="token punctuation">.</span><span class="token function">str_handler</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token constant">B</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span>
# 两次调用此类中的函数&#xff0c;产生两个类实例即a和b

<span class="token function">print</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>a<span class="token punctuation">.</span>name<span class="token punctuation">,</span> a<span class="token punctuation">.</span>age<span class="token punctuation">,</span> a<span class="token punctuation">.</span>height<span class="token punctuation">,</span> a<span class="token punctuation">.</span>salary<span class="token punctuation">)</span>
<span class="token function">print</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>b<span class="token punctuation">.</span>name<span class="token punctuation">,</span> b<span class="token punctuation">.</span>age<span class="token punctuation">,</span> b<span class="token punctuation">.</span>height<span class="token punctuation">,</span> b<span class="token punctuation">.</span>salary<span class="token punctuation">)</span>
# 查看类实例是否创建成功
</code></pre> 
<p><font color="#339966">运行结果&#xff1a;<br /> <img src="https://img-blog.csdnimg.cn/20201224214134594.png" alt="在这里插入图片描述" /></font></p> 
<h1><a id="font_color339966staticmethod_98"></a><font color="#339966">staticmethod</font></h1> 
<p>staticmethod也叫静态方法&#xff0c;实际上staticmethod装饰的函数的功能可能和类本身没什么太大的关系&#xff0c;因为<font color="#0099FF">staticmethod装饰的函数不能传入类实例或者类变量或者刚刚提到的cls</font>。因此这个函数处理的功能只是额外的&#xff0c;比如帮你记录一下日期之类的功能。这样的功能可能在某些时候会用上&#xff0c;所以就把这样的函数也顺带包装在类中。看一个例子就明白啦&#xff1a;</p> 
<pre><code class="prism language-javascript"><span class="token keyword">class</span> <span class="token class-name">Worker</span><span class="token punctuation">:</span>

    def <span class="token function">__init__</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>self<span class="token punctuation">,</span> name<span class="token punctuation">,</span> age<span class="token punctuation">,</span> height<span class="token punctuation">,</span> salary<span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">:</span>
        self<span class="token punctuation">.</span>name <span class="token operator">&#61;</span> name
        self<span class="token punctuation">.</span>age <span class="token operator">&#61;</span> age
        self<span class="token punctuation">.</span>height <span class="token operator">&#61;</span> height
        self<span class="token punctuation">.</span>salary <span class="token operator">&#61;</span> salary
    
    &#64;classmethod
    def <span class="token function">str_handler</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>cls<span class="token punctuation">,</span> string<span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">:</span>
        name<span class="token punctuation">,</span> age<span class="token punctuation">,</span> height<span class="token punctuation">,</span> salary <span class="token operator">&#61;</span> string<span class="token punctuation">.</span><span class="token function">split</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token string">&#39;/&#39;</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span>
        <span class="token keyword">return</span> <span class="token function">cls</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>name<span class="token punctuation">,</span> age<span class="token punctuation">,</span> height<span class="token punctuation">,</span> salary<span class="token punctuation">)</span>
        
    &#64;staticmethod           # 静态方法装饰器
    def <span class="token function">read_file</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>worker_file<span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">:</span>
        f <span class="token operator">&#61;</span> <span class="token function">open</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>worker_file<span class="token punctuation">,</span><span class="token string">&#39;r&#39;</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span>
        lines <span class="token operator">&#61;</span> f<span class="token punctuation">.</span><span class="token function">readlines</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span>
        <span class="token keyword">return</span> lines
    # 这里的功能就是读取工作人员的记录文件&#xff0c;将每一行内容作为一个item
    # 记录到lines列表&#xff0c;最后将列表传出以供后续利用
    # 有没有留意到&#xff0c;这个和类本身的功能是没有关系的&#xff0c;也就是实际上我们在类外部执行这个函数
    # 或者单独执行这些代码也是一样的功能&#xff0c;只不过包装在类中更便于管理和使用而已
    
all_workers <span class="token operator">&#61;</span> Worker<span class="token punctuation">.</span><span class="token function">read_file</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token string">&#39;2020_workers.txt&#39;</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span>  
# 使用上面的静态方法读取一个文件&#xff0c;这里假设有这个“<span class="token number">2020</span>_workers<span class="token punctuation">.</span>txt”文件&#xff0c;其中每行都是
# Jack<span class="token operator">/</span><span class="token number">20</span><span class="token operator">/</span><span class="token number">1.75</span><span class="token operator">/</span><span class="token number">1000</span> 这样的内容
<span class="token keyword">for</span> item <span class="token keyword">in</span> all_workers<span class="token punctuation">:</span>
    worker <span class="token operator">&#61;</span> Worker<span class="token punctuation">.</span><span class="token function">str_handlerhandler</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>item<span class="token punctuation">)</span>
# 通过<span class="token keyword">for</span>循环可以将文件中所有行都转为类实例
# 后面对类实例的操作就不写啦
</code></pre> 
<p>静态方法的内容较简单&#xff0c;就不多写啦。</p> 
<h1><a id="font_color339966property_133"></a><font color="#339966">property</font></h1> 
<p>相对来说property装饰器的使用可能较复杂一点&#xff0c;property的翻译就是属性&#xff0c;因此其跟属性有关啦。而装饰器又是用来装饰函数的&#xff0c;那其实<font color="#0099FF">加property装饰器的功能就是将函数的返回值作为类的属性</font>啦。什么意思呢&#xff0c;也就是说我们<font color="#0099FF">调用这个被装饰的函数不需要加括号去运行&#xff0c;而是直接像变量或者属性一样获取这个值</font>。</p> 
<p><font color="#339966">看下例子吧&#xff1a;</font></p> 
<pre><code class="prism language-javascript"><span class="token keyword">class</span> <span class="token class-name">Worker</span><span class="token punctuation">:</span>

    def <span class="token function">__init__</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>self<span class="token punctuation">,</span> name<span class="token punctuation">,</span> salary<span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">:</span>
        self<span class="token punctuation">.</span>name <span class="token operator">&#61;</span> name
        self<span class="token punctuation">.</span>salary <span class="token operator">&#61;</span> salary
        
    &#64;property
    def <span class="token function">name_and_salary</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>self<span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">:</span>
        <span class="token keyword">return</span> self<span class="token punctuation">.</span>name<span class="token operator">&#43;</span><span class="token string">&#39;的工资是&#39;</span><span class="token operator">&#43;</span><span class="token function">str</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>self<span class="token punctuation">.</span>salary<span class="token punctuation">)</span>
    # 需要有返回值&#xff0c;返回值作为获取到的属性嘛

<span class="token constant">A</span> <span class="token operator">&#61;</span> <span class="token function">Worker</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token string">&#39;Jack&#39;</span><span class="token punctuation">,</span><span class="token number">1000</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span>
<span class="token constant">A</span><span class="token punctuation">.</span>name_and_salary
# 注意这里不用加括号哦&#xff0c;像变量或者属性一样去调用就好了
</code></pre> 
<p>现在应该理解property的作用了吧&#xff0c;当然property不止这点作用&#xff0c;使用property装饰后&#xff0c;被装饰的函数就成为了新的装饰器&#xff0c;新的装饰器常用的有三个&#xff0c;如上例中就是getter(默认的&#xff0c;即赋予类使用者获取某属性的能力)、setter(赋予类使用者在类外部给某类属性重新赋值的能力)和deleter(赋予类使用者在类外部删除某属性的能力)。看下例子就理解啦&#xff1a;</p> 
<pre><code class="prism language-javascript"><span class="token keyword">class</span> <span class="token class-name">Worker</span><span class="token punctuation">:</span>

    def <span class="token function">__init__</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>self<span class="token punctuation">,</span> name<span class="token punctuation">,</span> salary<span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">:</span>
        self<span class="token punctuation">.</span>name <span class="token operator">&#61;</span> name
        self<span class="token punctuation">.</span>salary <span class="token operator">&#61;</span> salary

    &#64;property     
    # 先使用property装饰原函数&#xff0c;装饰之后就可以使用setter和deleter方法来进行装饰并有更多的功能了
    # 这里默认已经有了getter的功能&#xff0c;也就是能够获取到这个属性的能力
    def <span class="token function">view_salary</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>self<span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">:</span>
        <span class="token keyword">return</span> self<span class="token punctuation">.</span>salary

    &#64;view_salary<span class="token punctuation">.</span>setter
    # setter装饰器能够使我们在类外部重新设置view_salary这个属性
    # 而没有setter的话就会报错  AttributeError<span class="token punctuation">:</span> can&#39;t <span class="token keyword">set</span> attribute
    def <span class="token function">view_salary</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>self<span class="token punctuation">,</span> new_salary<span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">:</span>
        self<span class="token punctuation">.</span>salary <span class="token operator">&#61;</span> new_salary
        <span class="token keyword">return</span> new_salary

    &#64;view_salary<span class="token punctuation">.</span>deleter
    # deleter装饰器的设置使我们可以在类外部使用del删除这个属性&#xff0c;但是这里我试了将self<span class="token punctuation">.</span>salary
    # 设置为其它值也是可以的哦&#xff0c;这个值设置非空的话还是会有属性继续存在的哦。也就是在类外部使用
    # del的功能取决于你自己在这里设置的操作
    # 我这里是设置为空值了
    def <span class="token function">view_salary</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>self<span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">:</span>
        self<span class="token punctuation">.</span>salary <span class="token operator">&#61;</span> None

<span class="token constant">A</span> <span class="token operator">&#61;</span> <span class="token function">Worker</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token string">&#39;J&#39;</span><span class="token punctuation">,</span><span class="token number">1000</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span>

<span class="token constant">A</span><span class="token punctuation">.</span>view_salary <span class="token operator">&#61;</span> <span class="token number">2000</span>
# 这里在外部进行赋值&#xff0c;是使用的设置的setter方法哦&#xff0c;没有setter会报错的&#xff01;&#xff01;
<span class="token function">print</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token string">&#34;使用setter后的view_salary 值是&#xff1a;&#34;</span><span class="token constant">A</span><span class="token punctuation">.</span>view_salary<span class="token punctuation">)</span>

del <span class="token constant">A</span><span class="token punctuation">.</span>view_salary  # 尝试删除
<span class="token function">print</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token string">&#34;使用del后J 的view_salary 的属性值是&#xff1a;&#34;</span><span class="token constant">A</span><span class="token punctuation">.</span>view_salary<span class="token punctuation">)</span>
</code></pre> 
<p><font color="#339966">结果如下&#xff1a;<br /> <img src="https://img-blog.csdnimg.cn/20201224230808807.png" alt="在这里插入图片描述" /></font></p> 
<h1><a id="font_color339966_194"></a><font color="#339966">叮</font></h1> 
<p>我觉得应该多多看看我的例子就能够完全理解上面几个装饰器啦&#xff0c;我就不再多赘述啦&#xff01;当然这些技术不管怎么样都要用到实际应用中才能够发挥到其最终的功效&#xff0c;因此在你觉得可以使用某些方式的情况下一定要去尝试一下哦&#xff01;最后希望我的文章能帮到大家就是最好啦&#xff01;</p> 
<p><font color="#0099FF">今天是平安夜&#xff0c;明天是圣诞节&#xff0c;祝大家节日快乐&#xff0c;生活愉快呀&#xff01;可能到明年才有下一篇了&#xff0c;哈哈哈哈哈哈哈&#xff01;</font></p> 
<p>参考&#xff1a;<a href="https://www.py.cn/course/1106.html">https://www.py.cn/course/1106.html</a><br /> 参考&#xff1a;<a href="https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/64487092">https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/64487092</a><br /> 参考&#xff1a;<a href="http://c.biancheng.net/view/4561.html">http://c.biancheng.net/view/4561.html</a></p>

    def __init__(self, <em>method</em>):

<div class="recommend-item-box type_blog clearfix" data-url="https://blog.csdn.net/qq_39503067/article/details/110879596"  data-report-view='{"ab":"new","spm":"1001.2101.3001.6650.2","mod":"popu_387","extra":"{\"highlightScore\":0.0,\"utm_medium\":\"distribute.pc_relevant.none-task-blog-2~default~CTRLIST~default-2.no_search_link\",\"dist_request_id\":\"1642035171371_28595\"}","dist_request_id":"1642035171371_28595","ab_strategy":"default","index":"2","strategy":"2~default~CTRLIST~default","dest":"https://blog.csdn.net/qq_39503067/article/details/110879596"}'>
	<div class="content-box">
		<div class="content-blog display-flex">
			<div class="title-box">
				<a href="https://blog.csdn.net/qq_39503067/article/details/110879596" class="tit" target="_blank"  data-report-click='{"ab":"new","spm":"1001.2101.3001.6650.2","mod":"popu_387","extra":"{\"highlightScore\":0.0,\"utm_medium\":\"distribute.pc_relevant.none-task-blog-2~default~CTRLIST~default-2.no_search_link\",\"dist_request_id\":\"1642035171371_28595\"}","dist_request_id":"1642035171371_28595","ab_strategy":"default","index":"2","strategy":"2~default~CTRLIST~default","dest":"https://blog.csdn.net/qq_39503067/article/details/110879596"}'  data-report-query='spm=1001.2101.3001.6650.2&utm_medium=distribute.pc_relevant.none-task-blog-2%7Edefault%7ECTRLIST%7Edefault-2.no_search_link&depth_1-utm_source=distribute.pc_relevant.none-task-blog-2%7Edefault%7ECTRLIST%7Edefault-2.no_search_link'>
					<div class="left ellipsis-online ellipsis-online-1"><em>python</em><em>常用</em><em>装饰器</em></div>
				</a>
			</div>
			<div class="info-box display-flex">
				<div class="info">
					<a href="https://blog.csdn.net/qq_39503067" target="_blank"><span class="blog-title">qq_39503067的博客</span></a>
				</div>
				<div class="info display-flex">
					<span class="info-block time">12-08</span>
					<span class="info-block read"><img class="read-img" src="https://csdnimg.cn/release/blogv2/dist/pc/img/readCountWhite.png" alt="">
					338
					</span>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>
		<div class="desc-box">
			<a href="https://blog.csdn.net/qq_39503067/article/details/110879596" target="_blank"  data-report-click='{"ab":"new","spm":"1001.2101.3001.6650.2","mod":"popu_387","extra":"{\"highlightScore\":0.0,\"utm_medium\":\"distribute.pc_relevant.none-task-blog-2~default~CTRLIST~default-2.no_search_link\",\"dist_request_id\":\"1642035171371_28595\"}","dist_request_id":"1642035171371_28595","ab_strategy":"default","index":"2","strategy":"2~default~CTRLIST~default","dest":"https://blog.csdn.net/qq_39503067/article/details/110879596"}'  data-report-query='spm=1001.2101.3001.6650.2&utm_medium=distribute.pc_relevant.none-task-blog-2%7Edefault%7ECTRLIST%7Edefault-2.no_search_link&depth_1-utm_source=distribute.pc_relevant.none-task-blog-2%7Edefault%7ECTRLIST%7Edefault-2.no_search_link'>
				<div class="desc ellipsis-online ellipsis-online-1"><em>装饰器</em>
定义：在代码运行期间动态增加功能的方式，称之为&ldquo;<em>装饰器</em>&rdquo;（Decorator）。本质上，decorator就是一个返回函数的高阶函数。
impo<em>rt</em> functools,<em>ti</em>me

def execute_<em>ti</em>me(func):  # 定义<em>装饰器</em>
	# 此时调用f()时，实际上调用的是wrap<em>pe</em>r函数，返回值一样，但名字变了。
    @functools.wraps(func)  # 把名字改回来
    def wrap<em>pe</em>r(*args, **kw):
        <em>sta</em><em>rt</em>_<em>ti</em>me </div>
			</a>
		</div>
	</div>
</div>
<div class="recommend-item-box type_blog clearfix" data-url="https://blog.csdn.net/asszpdhpg/article/details/91361054"  data-report-view='{"ab":"new","spm":"1001.2101.3001.6650.3","mod":"popu_387","extra":"{\"highlightScore\":0.0,\"utm_medium\":\"distribute.pc_relevant.none-task-blog-2~default~CTRLIST~default-3.no_search_link\",\"dist_request_id\":\"1642035171371_28595\"}","dist_request_id":"1642035171371_28595","ab_strategy":"default","index":"3","strategy":"2~default~CTRLIST~default","dest":"https://blog.csdn.net/asszpdhpg/article/details/91361054"}'>
	<div class="content-box">
		<div class="content-blog display-flex">
			<div class="title-box">
				<a href="https://blog.csdn.net/asszpdhpg/article/details/91361054" class="tit" target="_blank"  data-report-click='{"ab":"new","spm":"1001.2101.3001.6650.3","mod":"popu_387","extra":"{\"highlightScore\":0.0,\"utm_medium\":\"distribute.pc_relevant.none-task-blog-2~default~CTRLIST~default-3.no_search_link\",\"dist_request_id\":\"1642035171371_28595\"}","dist_request_id":"1642035171371_28595","ab_strategy":"default","index":"3","strategy":"2~default~CTRLIST~default","dest":"https://blog.csdn.net/asszpdhpg/article/details/91361054"}'  data-report-query='spm=1001.2101.3001.6650.3&utm_medium=distribute.pc_relevant.none-task-blog-2%7Edefault%7ECTRLIST%7Edefault-3.no_search_link&depth_1-utm_source=distribute.pc_relevant.none-task-blog-2%7Edefault%7ECTRLIST%7Edefault-3.no_search_link'>
					<div class="left ellipsis-online ellipsis-online-1">关于<em>python</em>的<em>装饰器</em>@<em>classmethod</em></div>
				</a>
			</div>
			<div class="info-box display-flex">
				<div class="info">
					<a href="https://blog.csdn.net/asszpdhpg" target="_blank"><span class="blog-title">温暖✿</span></a>
				</div>
				<div class="info display-flex">
					<span class="info-block time">06-10</span>
					<span class="info-block read"><img class="read-img" src="https://csdnimg.cn/release/blogv2/dist/pc/img/readCountWhite.png" alt="">
					432
					</span>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>
		<div class="desc-box">
			<a href="https://blog.csdn.net/asszpdhpg/article/details/91361054" target="_blank"  data-report-click='{"ab":"new","spm":"1001.2101.3001.6650.3","mod":"popu_387","extra":"{\"highlightScore\":0.0,\"utm_medium\":\"distribute.pc_relevant.none-task-blog-2~default~CTRLIST~default-3.no_search_link\",\"dist_request_id\":\"1642035171371_28595\"}","dist_request_id":"1642035171371_28595","ab_strategy":"default","index":"3","strategy":"2~default~CTRLIST~default","dest":"https://blog.csdn.net/asszpdhpg/article/details/91361054"}'  data-report-query='spm=1001.2101.3001.6650.3&utm_medium=distribute.pc_relevant.none-task-blog-2%7Edefault%7ECTRLIST%7Edefault-3.no_search_link&depth_1-utm_source=distribute.pc_relevant.none-task-blog-2%7Edefault%7ECTRLIST%7Edefault-3.no_search_link'>
				<div class="desc ellipsis-online ellipsis-online-1">@<em>classmethod</em>：<em>装饰器</em>。顾名思义，对原物件进行外部修饰，不做内里的改变。

<em>classmethod</em>是用来指定一个<em>类</em>的方法为<em>类</em>方法，即顶着@<em>classmethod</em>所定义的函数，其所传递参数可为一个<em>类</em>，而非仅限于一般格式的诸如int、boolean等<em>类</em>型的参数。

<em>使用</em>方法如下：


<em>class</em> C:
    @<em>classmethod</em>
    def f(cls, arg1, arg2, ....</div>
			</a>
		</div>
	</div>
</div>
		<dl id="recommend-item-box-tow" class="recommend-item-box type_blog clearfix">
			<div id="kp_box_59" data-pid="59"><iframe  src="https://kunpeng-sc.csdnimg.cn/?timestamp=1623163941/#/preview/8748?positionId=59&queryWord=&spm=1001.2101.3001.5003" frameborder="0" width= "100%"  height= "75px" scrolling="no" ></iframe><img class="pre-img-lasy"  data-src="https://kunyu.csdn.net/1.png?p=59&a=5488&c=8748&k=&spm=1001.2101.3001.5003&d=1&t=3&u=bf4ab4a4d34a45dca4d70f8e225b4253" style="display: block;width: 0px;height: 0px;"></div>
		</dl>

					<div class="left ellipsis-online ellipsis-online-1"><em>装饰器</em>：@<em>classmethod</em></div>
				</a>
			</div>
			<div class="info-box display-flex">
				<div class="info">
					<a href="https://blog.csdn.net/weixin_46020624" target="_blank"><span class="blog-title">Esun Blog</span></a>

		<div class="desc-box">
			<a href="https://blog.csdn.net/weixin_46020624/article/details/104909904" target="_blank"  data-report-click='{"ab":"new","spm":"1001.2101.3001.6650.5","mod":"popu_387","extra":"{\"highlightScore\":0.0,\"utm_medium\":\"distribute.pc_relevant.none-task-blog-2~default~BlogCommendFromBaidu~default-5.no_search_link\",\"dist_request_id\":\"1642035171371_28595\"}","dist_request_id":"1642035171371_28595","ab_strategy":"default","index":"5","strategy":"2~default~BlogCommendFromBaidu~default","dest":"https://blog.csdn.net/weixin_46020624/article/details/104909904"}'  data-report-query='spm=1001.2101.3001.6650.5&utm_medium=distribute.pc_relevant.none-task-blog-2%7Edefault%7EBlogCommendFromBaidu%7Edefault-5.no_search_link&depth_1-utm_source=distribute.pc_relevant.none-task-blog-2%7Edefault%7EBlogCommendFromBaidu%7Edefault-5.no_search_link'>
				<div class="desc ellipsis-online ellipsis-online-1"><em>装饰器</em>
<em>类</em>方法@<em>classmethod</em>
普通<em>类</em>调用方法，先要实例化一个对象，@<em>classmethod</em>的<em>使用</em>，可以在不实例化对象的情况下调用<em>类</em><em>中</em>的方法。
<em>使用</em>方法：
直接<em>类</em>名.方法名()
@<em>classmethod</em>不需要表示自身对象的self，但第一个参数需要是表示自身<em>类</em>的cls参数，因为持有cls参数，可以来调用<em>类</em>的属性，<em>类</em>的方法，实例化对象等，避免硬编码
# 封装
<em>class</em> A(obeject)...</div>
			</a>
		</div>
	</div>
</div>

				<div class="desc ellipsis-online ellipsis-online-1">用函数<em>装饰</em>函数这种比较常见首先定义<em>装饰器</em>函数def cache(func):data = {}@wraps(func)def wrap<em>pe</em>r(*args, **kwargs):key = f&#<em>3</em>9;{func.__name__}-{<em>st</em>r(args)}-{<em>st</em>r(kwargs)})&#<em>3</em>9;if key in data:result = data.g<em>et</em>(key)<em>pr</em>int(&#<em>3</em>9;cache&#<em>3</em>9;)else:resul...</div>

<div class="recommend-item-box type_blog clearfix" data-url="https://blog.csdn.net/disui7868/article/details/102228511"  data-report-view='{"ab":"new","spm":"1001.2101.3001.6650.8","mod":"popu_387","extra":"{\"highlightScore\":0.0,\"utm_medium\":\"distribute.pc_relevant.none-task-blog-2~default~BlogCommendFromBaidu~default-8.no_search_link\",\"dist_request_id\":\"1642035171371_28595\"}","dist_request_id":"1642035171371_28595","ab_strategy":"default","index":"8","strategy":"2~default~BlogCommendFromBaidu~default","dest":"https://blog.csdn.net/disui7868/article/details/102228511"}'>
	<div class="content-box">
		<div class="content-blog display-flex">
			<div class="title-box">
				<a href="https://blog.csdn.net/disui7868/article/details/102228511" class="tit" target="_blank"  data-report-click='{"ab":"new","spm":"1001.2101.3001.6650.8","mod":"popu_387","extra":"{\"highlightScore\":0.0,\"utm_medium\":\"distribute.pc_relevant.none-task-blog-2~default~BlogCommendFromBaidu~default-8.no_search_link\",\"dist_request_id\":\"1642035171371_28595\"}","dist_request_id":"1642035171371_28595","ab_strategy":"default","index":"8","strategy":"2~default~BlogCommendFromBaidu~default","dest":"https://blog.csdn.net/disui7868/article/details/102228511"}'  data-report-query='spm=1001.2101.3001.6650.8&utm_medium=distribute.pc_relevant.none-task-blog-2%7Edefault%7EBlogCommendFromBaidu%7Edefault-8.no_search_link&depth_1-utm_source=distribute.pc_relevant.none-task-blog-2%7Edefault%7EBlogCommendFromBaidu%7Edefault-8.no_search_link'>
					<div class="left ellipsis-online ellipsis-online-1"><em>类</em><em>中</em><em>三个</em><em>装饰器</em></div>

				<div class="desc ellipsis-online ellipsis-online-1">目录
    
        
        <em>类</em><em>中</em>的<em>三个</em><em>装饰器</em>
        一<em>、@</em><em>classmethod</em>
        二<em>、@</em><em>staticmethod</em><em>装饰器</em><em>装饰</em>静态方法
        三.@<em>property</em> 把一个方法伪装成属性
        
    

<em>类</em><em>中</em>的<em>三个</em><em>装饰器</em>
<em>装饰</em><em>类</em><em>中</em>的方法

				<div class="desc ellipsis-online ellipsis-online-1">说到<em>装饰器</em>，就不得不说<em>python</em>自带的<em>三个</em><em>装饰器</em>：
1<em>、@</em><em>property</em> 将某函数，做为属性<em>使用</em>
@<em>property</em> 修饰，就是将方法，变成一个属性来<em>使用</em>。

<em>class</em> A():

    @<em>property</em>
    def pfunc(self):
        r<em>et</em>urn self.value

    @pfunc.s<em>et</em>t<em>er</em>
    def pfunc(self,value):...</div>

				<div class="desc ellipsis-online ellipsis-online-1"><em>property</em>
概念
作用：将一个方法伪装成属性
​&emsp;&emsp;如下，定义一个<em>St</em>udent<em>类</em>，<em>类</em><em>中</em>有一个计算年龄的方法，在最后调用的时候，需要通过tom.age()的方式来获取对象的年龄；age为名词，理论上用属性来表示更为合适，这种调用方式明显能看出age是一个方法
impo<em>rt</em> <em>ti</em>me

<em>class</em> <em>St</em>udent:
    def __init__(self,name,bi<em>rt</em>h):
    ...</div>
			</a>
		</div>
	</div>
</div>

def decorator(f):
    def wrap<em>pe</em>r(x,y):
        <em>pr</em>int(&amp;amp;amp;quot;参数1为:%s,参数2为:%s&amp;amp;amp;quot;%(x,y))
        r<em>et</em>urn f(x,y)

				<div class="desc ellipsis-online ellipsis-online-1">此文章已不再更新，查看最新版文章：

《<em>Python</em> @<em>staticmethod</em>和@<em>classmethod</em>》



------------------------------------------------- 分隔符-------------------------------------------------

一般来说，<em>类</em>的函数都需要实例化后，通过实例化对象来<em>使用</em>。就像这样：


...</div>
			</a>
		</div>
	</div>

				<div class="desc ellipsis-online ellipsis-online-1">本篇文章给大家带来的内容是关于<em>python</em><em>装饰器</em>是什么？怎么用？有一定的参考价值，有需要的朋友可以参考一下，希望对你有所帮助。在学习<em>python</em>过程<em>中</em>，相信大家对<em>装饰器</em>的概念很模糊，我也是困惑了很久，决定写一篇文章梳理一下。首先要搞清楚什么是<em>装饰器</em>：简单来说，可以把<em>装饰器</em>理解为一个包装函数的函数，在函数运行时增加功能但不影响这个函数原有内容，还可以进行函数执行后的清理工作。举一个小例子@func1...</div>

				<div class="desc ellipsis-online ellipsis-online-1">有时，比如写RF的测试库的时候，很多方法都写在一个<em>类</em>里。我们又可能需要一个通用的<em>装饰器</em>，比如，要给某个底层<em>类</em>的方法打桩，查看入参和出参，用以理解业务；或者要hold住所有的执行错误，打印堆栈又不想程序退出或用例直接失败
比如捕捉错误的<em>装饰器</em>
impo<em>rt</em> traceback
from functools impo<em>rt</em> wraps


def tri<em>er</em>(soft=False):
    &#<em>3</em>9;&#<em>3</em>9;&#<em>3</em>9;
 ...</div>

					<div class="left ellipsis-online ellipsis-online-1"><em>python</em><em>中常</em>用的内置<em>装饰器</em></div>
				</a>
			</div>
			<div class="info-box display-flex">
				<div class="info">
					<a href="https://blog.csdn.net/felix_yujing" target="_blank"><span class="blog-title">B.I.T</span></a>

		<div class="desc-box">
			<a href="https://blog.csdn.net/felix_yujing/article/details/79749944" target="_blank"  data-report-click='{"ab":"new","spm":"1001.2101.3001.6650.18","mod":"popu_387","extra":"{\"highlightScore\":0.0,\"utm_medium\":\"distribute.pc_relevant.none-task-blog-2~default~BlogCommendFromBaidu~default-18.no_search_link\",\"dist_request_id\":\"1642035171371_28595\"}","dist_request_id":"1642035171371_28595","ab_strategy":"default","index":"18","strategy":"2~default~BlogCommendFromBaidu~default","dest":"https://blog.csdn.net/felix_yujing/article/details/79749944"}'  data-report-query='spm=1001.2101.3001.6650.18&utm_medium=distribute.pc_relevant.none-task-blog-2%7Edefault%7EBlogCommendFromBaidu%7Edefault-18.no_search_link&depth_1-utm_source=distribute.pc_relevant.none-task-blog-2%7Edefault%7EBlogCommendFromBaidu%7Edefault-18.no_search_link'>
				<div class="desc ellipsis-online ellipsis-online-1">@<em>property</em>

使调用<em>类</em><em>中</em>的方法像引用<em>类</em><em>中</em>的字段属性一样。被修饰的特性方法，内部可以实现处理逻辑，但对外提供统一的调用方式。遵循了统一访问的原则。

示例：

# c<em>od</em>ing: utf-8
<em>class</em> Te<em>st</em><em>Class</em>:
    name = &quot;te<em>st</em>&quot;

    def __init__(self, name):
        self.name = name

    @<em>prop</em>...</div>
			</a>
		</div>
	</div>
</div>
<div class="recommend-item-box type_blog clearfix" data-url="https://blog.csdn.net/qq_34400745/article/details/107394767"  data-report-view='{"ab":"new","spm":"1001.2101.3001.6650.19","mod":"popu_387","extra":"{\"highlightScore\":0.0,\"utm_medium\":\"distribute.pc_relevant.none-task-blog-2~default~BlogCommendFromBaidu~default-19.no_search_link\",\"dist_request_id\":\"1642035171371_28595\"}","dist_request_id":"1642035171371_28595","ab_strategy":"default","index":"19","strategy":"2~default~BlogCommendFromBaidu~default","dest":"https://blog.csdn.net/qq_34400745/article/details/107394767"}'>
	<div class="content-box">
		<div class="content-blog display-flex">
			<div class="title-box">
				<a href="https://blog.csdn.net/qq_34400745/article/details/107394767" class="tit" target="_blank"  data-report-click='{"ab":"new","spm":"1001.2101.3001.6650.19","mod":"popu_387","extra":"{\"highlightScore\":0.0,\"utm_medium\":\"distribute.pc_relevant.none-task-blog-2~default~BlogCommendFromBaidu~default-19.no_search_link\",\"dist_request_id\":\"1642035171371_28595\"}","dist_request_id":"1642035171371_28595","ab_strategy":"default","index":"19","strategy":"2~default~BlogCommendFromBaidu~default","dest":"https://blog.csdn.net/qq_34400745/article/details/107394767"}'  data-report-query='spm=1001.2101.3001.6650.19&utm_medium=distribute.pc_relevant.none-task-blog-2%7Edefault%7EBlogCommendFromBaidu%7Edefault-19.no_search_link&depth_1-utm_source=distribute.pc_relevant.none-task-blog-2%7Edefault%7EBlogCommendFromBaidu%7Edefault-19.no_search_link'>
					<div class="left ellipsis-online ellipsis-online-1">5.unitte<em>st</em>_<em>装饰器</em>（@<em>classmethod</em>）</div>
				</a>
			</div>
			<div class="info-box display-flex">
				<div class="info">
					<a href="https://blog.csdn.net/qq_34400745" target="_blank"><span class="blog-title">安小静--</span></a>
				</div>
				<div class="info display-flex">
					<span class="info-block time">07-16</span>
					<span class="info-block read"><img class="read-img" src="https://csdnimg.cn/release/blogv2/dist/pc/img/readCountWhite.png" alt="">
					145
					</span>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>
		<div class="desc-box">
			<a href="https://blog.csdn.net/qq_34400745/article/details/107394767" target="_blank"  data-report-click='{"ab":"new","spm":"1001.2101.3001.6650.19","mod":"popu_387","extra":"{\"highlightScore\":0.0,\"utm_medium\":\"distribute.pc_relevant.none-task-blog-2~default~BlogCommendFromBaidu~default-19.no_search_link\",\"dist_request_id\":\"1642035171371_28595\"}","dist_request_id":"1642035171371_28595","ab_strategy":"default","index":"19","strategy":"2~default~BlogCommendFromBaidu~default","dest":"https://blog.csdn.net/qq_34400745/article/details/107394767"}'  data-report-query='spm=1001.2101.3001.6650.19&utm_medium=distribute.pc_relevant.none-task-blog-2%7Edefault%7EBlogCommendFromBaidu%7Edefault-19.no_search_link&depth_1-utm_source=distribute.pc_relevant.none-task-blog-2%7Edefault%7EBlogCommendFromBaidu%7Edefault-19.no_search_link'>
				<div class="desc ellipsis-online ellipsis-online-1">前面讲到unitte<em>st</em>里面s<em>et</em>Up可以在每次执行用例前执行，这样有效的减少了代码量，但是有个弊端，比如打开浏览<em>器</em>操作，每次执行用例时候都会重新打开，这样就会浪费很多时间。
于是就想是不是可以只打开一次浏览<em>器</em>，执行完用例再关闭呢？这就需要用到<em>装饰器</em>（@<em>classmethod</em>）来解决了。
一、<em>装饰器</em>

用s<em>et</em>Up与s<em>et</em>Up<em>Class</em>区别


s<em>et</em>up():每个测试case运行前运行
teardown():每个测试case运行完后执行
s<em>et</em>Up<em>Class</em>():必须<em>使用</em>@<em>classmethod</em> <em>装饰器</em>,</div>
			</a>
		</div>
	</div>
</div>
            </div>
            <div class="template-box">
                <span>©️2021 CSDN</span>
                <span>皮肤主题: 游动-白</span>
                <span> 设计师:白松林</span>
                <span>
                    <a href="https://blog.csdn.net/" class="back-home c-blue c-blue-hover c-blue-focus">返回首页</a>
                </span>
            </div>

      if (sideToolbar.length > 0) {
        sideToolbar.css('cssText','bottom:64px !important;')

      }
    }, 200);

<script>
 // 全局声明
 if (window.csdn === undefined) {
      window.csdn = {};
    }
    window.csdn.sideToolbar = {
        options: {
            report:{
                isShow: true,
            },
            qr: {
                isShow: false,
            },
            guide: {
                isShow: true
            }
        }
    }
    $(function(){
        $(document).on('click',"a.option-box[data-type='report']",function() {
            window.csdn.userLogin.loadAjax(function(res){
                window.csdn.feedback({
                    "type":'blog',
                    "rtype":'article',
                    "rid":articleId,
                    "reportedName":username,
                    "submitOptions":{
                        "title":articleTitle,
                        "contentUrl":articleDetailUrl
                    },
                    "callback":function(){
                        showToast({
                            text: "感谢您的举报，我们会尽快审核！",
                            bottom: '10%', 
                            zindex: 9000, 
                            speed: 500,
                            time: 1500
                        });
                    }
                })
            })
        });
    })
</script>
